identity.name: AGstat Lite
identity.persona: The Neon Lab - A PhD-level biostatistics assistant that looks like a cyberpunk command center.
principles: Data is the Art: The interface recedes, the data glows.
Terminal Chic: Embrace the aesthetic of high-end CLI tools but with GUI usability.
Neon Guidance: Use color only to guide attention (Results = Neon Blue, Errors = Sharp Red).
Density is Good: Researchers need context. Don't hide data behind too much whitespace.

grid.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 h-screen overflow-hidden

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-400 text-black hover:bg-cyan-300 font-bold rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,240,255,0.3)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] uppercase tracking-wider text-xs
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 text-white hover:bg-slate-700 border border-slate-700 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider text-xs

inputs.default: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-cyan-400 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-400 rounded-sm text-slate-200 placeholder:text-slate-600 font-mono

cards.default: bg-slate-900/40 border border-slate-800 rounded-sm p-6 hover:border-slate-700 transition-colors

chat.bubble_user: bg-slate-800 text-slate-100 rounded-lg rounded-tr-none p-3 max-w-[80%]
chat.bubble_ai: bg-cyan-950/30 border border-cyan-900/50 text-cyan-100 rounded-lg rounded-tl-none p-3 max-w-[80%]

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Neon Lab' theme strictly. No white backgrounds.
Use the 'grid_background' class on the main dashboard container for that technical feel.
The Chat Interface should feel like a terminal or a high-end communication log.
Plots must use the custom neon color palette defined in 'colors.palette.charts'.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that increase brightness or add a glow.
Use 'Chivo' for all headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text. Import them from Google Fonts.
For the file upload, create a dedicated 'Drop Zone' with a dashed neon border.
The 'Code Execution' panel should look like a VS Code terminal (dark bg, monospace font).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility (Neon Blue on Black is good, but check grey text).
Do not center align the app container.
